    • evaluate

      public Object evaluate(Object domainObject, DomainReader domainReader)
      Description copied from interface: Expression
      The method that evaluates the expression on a domain object.
      Specified by:
      evaluate in interface Expression
      Overrides:
      evaluate in class SelectExpression
      Parameters:
      domainObject - the domain object on which the evaluation is computed
      domainReader - the loose coupling interface for reading data (domain fields and parameters)
      Returns:
      the result of the evaluation. Its java class should be compliant with the type returned by getType().

      Overrides:

      Parameters:
